name: Antique Construction
desc: Antique components reduce the chance of gaining new d-mods after being destroyed by %s, and the ship is almost always recoverable after battle.
short: Reduces impact of d-mods; ship almost always recoverable if lost.

name: Recovered Reactor
desc:
A high-grade reactor increases flux dissipation by %s/%s/%s/%s depending on hull size. 

Minor defects lower repair rate of weapons and engines by %s.

name: Overfed Magazines
desc:
By bypassing ammo limiters and overriding safeties, the ship is able to store %s more ammo in ballistc weapons. It also increases ballistic fire rate by %s.

This also causes the peak performance time of the ship to be cut in half, and creates a small chance for weapons to malfunction.

Can not be installed on civilian ships or ships with Safety Overrides.

name: Harmonized Ferroplating
desc:
By running exotic currents through high-grade ferro-composites, the shipâ€™s armor is able to absorb damage more easily.

Reduces armor and hull damage from both energy and high explosive weapons by %s.
short: Adds resistance to energy and high-explosive damage.

name: Oversized Engine Nacelles
desc:
Massive engine nacelles are built into the frame of this craft. Utilizing a unique flux drive system, the ship can use its zero flux boost at all flux levels.

However, these nozzles are especially vulnerable, making them recieve %s more damage.

name: Exotic Flux Compounds
desc: Unknown processes lend flux produced by this vessel unique characteristics, speeding up venting by %s.

name: Zero Flux Jets
desc: Unique engine structures grant this vessel %s more speed from its zero flux boost.

name: Fays Core
desc: A Fays Co. brand targeting core grants this ship %s more range to all non-missile weapons. Precludes the use of a Dedicated Targeting Core or Integrated Targeting Unit.
